content: I've been meaning to try out some new cooking techniques, like braising. I've heard it's a great way to cook tougher cuts of meat, but I've also seen some recipes that use braising for vegetables. Do you think I could use braising for sweet potatoes? I've been experimenting with different types of cuisine at home, and I've recently discovered a great recipe for roasted sweet potato and black bean tacos, which have become a staple in my household.
